objects.specification: A simple rectangular floor spanning ten meters wide and eight meters deep, featuring a smooth light grey matte finish suitable for a medium-sized exhibition booth. The surface is flat with minimal thickness and has subtle concrete texture for realism.
A simple white interior wall panel, three meters high, minimalistic design with flat matte paint finish.
A simple white interior wall panel, three meters high, minimalistic design with flat matte paint finish.
A simple white interior wall panel, three meters high, minimalistic design with flat matte paint finish.

A rectangular registration desk measuring two meters wide, one meter deep, and one meter tall. It features sharp edges and a glossy lacquer finish in bright red color for maximum visibility.

A modern cylindrical pedestal display with one-meter diameter and one-meter height, finished in a vibrant blue metallic coating. The design is sleek, with smooth curved surfaces and a subtle bevel on top edges.
A rectangular table display one and a half meters wide, eighty centimeters deep, and one meter tall. It has a vibrant blue industrial matte finish and clean minimalist styling.

A wall-mounted shelf display two meters wide, two meters tall, and thirty centimeters deep. It has a vibrant blue glossy protective coating, featuring thin profile shelves and a minimalist overall aesthetic.
A small round table with one-meter diameter and five-centimeter thick top, supported by a central metal pedestal. The finish is pure white with a sleek modern cafe style.
A modern chair with a green cushioned seat and backrest, half-meter cube footprint, with slim metal legs and a contemporary minimalist design.

An elongated rectangular banner with thickness ten centimeters and slight depth, featuring vibrant blue color and lightweight fabric texture. It hangs close to the wall with minimal hardware visible.

A ceiling-mounted spotlight fixture emitting a warm yellow conical beam with high intensity. The housing is compact with a minimal modern design, designed to illuminate specific booth elements.

Lush spherical foliage with realistic green leaf texture, forming a full round canopy above the pot, color is deep forest green.
